email_text.subject: New notification from {$siteTitle}
email_text.body:
You have a new notification from {$siteTitle}:

{$notificationContents}

Link: {$url}

{$principalContactSignature}
email_text.description: The email is sent to registered users that have selected to have this type of notification emailed to them.

email_text.subject: Password Reset Confirmation
email_text.body:
We have received a request to reset your password for the {$siteTitle} web site.

If you did not make this request, please ignore this email and your password will not be changed. If you wish to reset your password, click on the below URL.

Reset my password: {$url}

{$principalContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent to a registered user when they indicate that they have forgotten their password or are unable to login. It provides a URL they can follow to reset their password.

email_text.subject: Password Reset
email_text.body:
Your password has been successfully reset for use with the {$siteTitle} web site. Please retain this username and password, as it is necessary for all work with the server.

Your username: {$username}
Password: {$password}

{$principalContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent to a registered user when they have successfully reset their password following the process described in the PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM email.

email_text.subject: Server Registration
email_text.body:
{$userFullName}

You have now been registered as a user with {$contextName}. We have included your username and password in this email, which are needed for all work with this server through its website. At any point, you can ask to be removed from the server's list of users by contacting me.

Username: {$username}
Password: {$password}

Thank you,
{$principalContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered user to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: Validate Your Account
email_text.body:
{$userFullName}

You have created an account with {$contextName}, but before you can start using it, you need to validate your email account. To do this, simply follow the link below:

{$activateUrl}

Thank you,
{$principalContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered user to validate their email account.

email_text.subject: New Preprint Published
email_text.body:
Readers:

{$contextName} has just published its latest preprint at {$contextUrl}.
Thanks for the continuing interest in our work,
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent to registered readers via the "Notify Users" link in the Editor's User Home. It notifies readers of a new preprint and invites them to visit the server at a supplied URL.

email_text.subject: Archiving Request for {$contextName}
email_text.body:
Dear [University Librarian]

{$contextName} <{$contextUrl}>, is a server for which a member of your faculty, [name of member], serves as a [title of position]. The server is seeking to establish a LOCKSS (Lots of Copies Keep Stuff Safe) compliant archive with this and other university libraries.

[Brief description of server]

The URL to the LOCKSS Publisher Manifest for our server is: {$contextUrl}/gateway/lockss

We understand that you are already participating in LOCKSS. If we can provide any additional metadata for purposes of registering our server with your version of LOCKSS, we would be happy to provide it.

Thank you,
{$principalContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email requests the keeper of a LOCKSS archive to consider including this server in their archive. It provides the URL to the server's LOCKSS Publisher Manifest.

email_text.subject: Submission Acknowledgement
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:

Thank you for submitting the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}" to {$contextName}. With the online server management system that we are using, you will be able to track its progress through the editorial process by logging in to the server web site:

Submission URL: {$submissionUrl}
Username: {$authorUsername}

If you have any questions, please contact me. Thank you for considering this server as a venue for your work.

{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email, when enabled, is automatically sent to an author when he or she completes the process of submitting a manuscript to the server. It provides information about tracking the submission through the process and thanks the author for the submission.

email_text.subject: Submission Acknowledgement
email_text.body:
Hello,

{$submitterName} has submitted the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}" to {$contextName}.

If you have any questions, please contact me. Thank you for considering this server as a venue for your work.

{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email, when enabled, is automatically sent to the other authors who are not users within OJS specified during the submission process.

email_text.subject: Editorial Assignment
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:

The submission, "{$submissionTitle}," to {$contextName} has been assigned to you to see through the editorial process in your role as Series Editor.

Submission URL: {$submissionUrl}
Username: {$editorUsername}

Thank you.
email_text.description: This email notifies a Series Editor that the Editor has assigned them the task of overseeing a submission through the editing process. It provides information about the submission and how to access the server site.

email_text.subject: Editor Decision
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:

We have reached a decision regarding your submission to {$contextName}, "{$submissionTitle}".

Our decision is to: Accept Submission
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Series Editor to an Author notifies them of a final "accept submission" decision regarding their submission.

email_text.subject: Editor Decision
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:

We have reached a decision regarding your submission to {$contextName}, "{$submissionTitle}".

Our decision is to: Decline Submission
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Series Editor to an Author notifies them of a final "decline" decision regarding their submission.

email_texts.email_text:
Editor Recommendation {$editors}:

The recommendation regarding the submission to {$contextName}, "{$submissionTitle}" is: {$recommendation} <<<<<<< HEAD This email from the recommending Editor or Series Editor to the decision making Editors or Series Editors notifies them of a final recommendation regarding the submission. ======= This email from the recommending Editor or Section Editor to the decision making Editors or Section Editors notifies them of a final recommendation regarding the submission.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Request
email_text.body:
{$participantName}:

I would ask that you undertake the copyediting of "{$submissionTitle}" for {$contextName} by following these steps.
1. Click on the Submission URL below.
2. Open any files available under Draft Files and do your copyediting, while adding any Copyediting Discussions as needed.
3. Save copyedited file(s), and upload to Copyedited panel.
4. Notify the Editor that all files have been prepared, and that the Production process may begin.

{$contextName} URL: {$contextUrl}
Submission URL: {$submissionUrl}
Username: {$participantUsername}
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Section Editor to a submission's Copyeditor to request that they begin the copyediting process. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Request Galleys
email_text.body:
{$participantName}:

The submission "{$submissionTitle}" to {$contextName} now needs galleys laid out by following these steps.
1. Click on the Submission URL below.
2. Log into the journal and use the Production Ready files to create the galleys according to the journal's standards.
3. Upload the galleys to the Galley Files section.
4. Notify the Editor using Production Discussions that the galleys are uploaded and ready.

{$contextName} URL: {$contextUrl}
Submission URL: {$submissionUrl}
Username: {$participantUsername}

If you are unable to undertake this work at this time or have any questions, please contact me. Thank you for your contribution to this journal.
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor notifies them that they have been assigned the task of performing layout editing on a submission. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Galleys Complete
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:

Galleys have now been prepared for the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}," for {$contextName} and are ready for proofreading.

If you have any questions, please contact me.

{$participantName}
email_text.description: This email from the Layout Editor to the Section Editor notifies them that the layout process has been completed.

email_text.subject: Article of Possible Interest
email_text.body: Thought you might be interested in seeing "{$submissionTitle}" by {$authorName} published in Vol {$volume}, No {$number} ({$year}) of {$contextName} at "{$articleUrl}".
email_text.description: This email template provides a registered reader with the opportunity to send information about an article to somebody who may be interested. It is available via the Reading Tools and must be enabled by the Journal Manager in the Reading Tools Administration page.

email_text.subject: Subscription Notification
email_text.body:
{$subscriberName}:

You have now been registered as a subscriber in our online journal management system for {$contextName}, with the following subscription:

{$subscriptionType}

To access content that is available only to subscribers, simply log in to the system with your username, "{$username}".

Once you have logged in to the system you can change your profile details and password at any point.

Please note that if you have an institutional subscription, there is no need for users at your institution to log in, since requests for subscription content will be automatically authenticated by the system.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.

{$subscriptionContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email notifies a registered reader that the Manager has created a subscription for them. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.

email_text.subject: Issue Now Open Access
email_text.body:
Readers:

{$contextName} has just made available in an open access format the following issue. We invite you to review the Table of Contents here and then visit our web site ({$contextUrl}) to review articles and items of interest.

Thanks for the continuing interest in our work,
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent to registered readers who have requested to receive a notification email when an issue becomes open access.
